name: PermitPortal
headline: AI Operating System for Pre-construction
description: We are building workflows to help developers go from finding and closing development sites to getting a building permit faster. PermitPortal accelerates the most critical parts of the pre-construction phase: finding the right sites, understanding entitlements and navigating local development sentiment.

founders.name: Radu Mazilu, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of PermitPortal  |  Previously developed 700MW of clean energy projects in Europe  |  Founding Engineer of Fleek (W22)  |  UCL'19

founders.name: Alexandru Enache, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of PermitPortal | Previously developed 700MW of clean energy projects in Europe | Founding Engineer of Fleek (W22) | King's College London'19

generated_description:
**PermitPortal: Revolutionizing Pre-Construction with AI**

Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator’s Batch F24, PermitPortal is anchored in San Francisco, driven by a lean team of two. Their mission? To streamline and fast-track the often tedious pre-construction process for real estate developers. The company emerged from the recognition of the hurdles developers face—from scouting sites to securing building permits. 

### What They Do

PermitPortal offers an AI-powered operating system tailored for pre-construction workflows. They help users find development sites, understand entitlements, and gauge local sentiment—all critical aspects that can cause delays and complications in development projects. Their platform leverages AI to deliver insights, automate workflows, and harness local intelligence, which cuts the time to get “shovel ready” by a substantial 50%.

### Key Features

- **AI Site Search**: Users can search for properties with plain language, enabling the AI to analyze zoning, market data, and infrastructure to find suitable sites.
- **Automated Workflows**: Forget manual tracking. PermitPortal allows seamless tracking of project statuses and can even send letters of interest with a single click.
- **Local Intelligence**: Gain insights into community sentiment, approval histories, and the local regulatory landscape, providing developers with a clearer understanding of potential roadblocks.

### How It Works

The platform offers functionalities like:

- Describing the ideal site in plain English for accurate AI-driven search results.
- Generating detailed due diligence reports in seconds that turn complex property data into actionable insights.
- Providing real-time project tracking linked directly to data rooms for enhanced management oversight.

### The Vision

PermitPortal aims to transform how real estate developers navigate the intricate pre-construction landscape. Their approach not only makes finding sites easier but also ensures that developers are better equipped to handle local regulations and stakeholder sentiments, ultimately leading to faster approvals and less overhead time.

If you’re in the real estate or construction space and tired of the prolonged pre-construction timeline, PermitPortal could be your next best ally. Their straightforward, AI-driven tools promise to make the process faster, more efficient, and significantly less cumbersome.

To see PermitPortal in action or to start redefining your pre-construction experience, check out their website: [PermitPortal](https://permitportalapp.com/).
